project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Municipality of La Paz Secondary Education Transformation Project for Bolivia is to support La Paz's education strategy by: (i) increasing access to secondary education for adolescents and young people and improving their permanence in the education system; (ii) improving quality and relevance of primary and secondary education; and (iii) strengthening the decentralized education management capacity. The changes and rationale are as follows: 1) a revision of the scope and description of some project sub-components to respond to project, municipal and country realities, including the new education law, Avelino Sinani - Elizardo Perez , which was passed in December 2010; 2) a reallocation of funds among categories consistent with the increase in cost of construction, furniture and equipment and a consequent reduction in the cost and scope of project activities relating to the quality of education and institutional strengthening; 3) a revision of the results matrix to reflect the adjustments in project activities. New indicators have been introduced to monitor the number of direct project beneficiaries; and 4) a six-month extension of the closing date so that the remaining planned classrooms can be completed.

P083965.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ES</LangCode><ProjectName>Bolivia: Proyecto de transformación de la educación secundaria</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>El Proyecto de transformación de la educación secundaria en Bolivia tiene por objeto apoyar la estrategia educativa del gobierno municipal, mediante las siguientes acciones: i) incrementar el acceso y garantizar la permanencia en la educación secundaria de los jóvenes y adolescentes de su jurisdicción; ii) mejorar la calidad y la pertinencia de la educación primaria y secundaria, y iii) fortalecer la capacidad de gestión descentralizada del municipio de La Paz. El proyecto incluye los componentes siguientes: acceso y permanencia; calidad de la educación, y gestión de la educación y fortalecimiento institucional.</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
